name: DeepL
natural_language_description: 这是 DeepL 节点。主要用于: Translate data using DeepL

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: language

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: translate

text.name: text
text.natural_language_description: 参数名: Text | 作用: Input text to translate | (必填项)

translateTo.name: translateTo
translateTo.description: Language to translate to. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
translateTo.natural_language_description: 参数名: Target Language Name or ID | 作用: Language to translate to. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: sourceLang (值: None) - Language to translate from. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
splitSentences (值: None) - How the translation engine should split sentences
preserveFormatting (值: None) - Whether the translation engine should respect the original formatting, even if it would usually correct some aspects
formality (值: None) - How formal or informal the target text should be. May not be supported with all languages.
